body: Sorry this makes me sound like a noob... But where do I apply? I can't find it, and I'd love to apply. If you need any requirements please tell me them... Currently awaiting an answer!
body_tagged: Sorry this makes me sound like a noob... But where do I apply? I can't find it, and I'd love to apply. If you need any requirements please tell me them... Currently awaiting an answer!
title: How do I apply for mod?

replies.body:
Staff Applications are currently closed, however when they open again you can post an application here: http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3

Hopefully more information about the criteria will be revealed soon.
replies.body_tagged:
Staff Applications are currently closed, however when they open again you can post an application here: http://avicus.net/forums?topic_id=3

Hopefully more information about the criteria will be revealed soon.

replies.body: i am waiting too!
replies.body_tagged: i am waiting too!

replies.body:
For the time being they are closed, as SweetMango stated.
Just make sure to be active in-game, on the forums, and on TeamSpeak 3, and you will find out what you need to apply soon.
replies.body_tagged:
For the time being they are closed, as SweetMango stated.
Just make sure to be active in-game, on the forums, and on TeamSpeak 3, and you will find out what you need to apply soon.

replies.body:
Yes Listen to the pig!


But in all seriousness you apply when they are open, you will be accepted and put into interviews if accepted then you will be Jr.Mod if you do your job you go to moderator if they want you to be a jr.mod a bit longer thats's what happens, Howsie22 is in charge of this if you have any other questions either get in contact with him or avigill and he can give you howsie's skype.
replies.body_tagged:
Yes Listen to the pig!


But in all seriousness you apply when they are open, you will be accepted and put into interviews if accepted then you will be Jr.Mod if you do your job you go to moderator if they want you to be a jr.mod a bit longer thats's what happens, Howsie22 is in charge of this if you have any other questions either get in contact with him or avigill and he can give you howsie's skype.

replies.body: Staff applications closed. However, you can apply by posting your application in the "Staff Aplications" section of the forums when the applications open back up, which is next January through March. Plus, staff members don't bump topics..
replies.body_tagged: Staff applications closed. However, you can apply by posting your application in the "Staff Aplications" section of the forums when the applications open back up, which is next January through March. Plus, staff members don't bump topics..

replies.body:
hehe

1. Caring is good but not too much or you seem like a pedo sometimes.
2. You got a warn for spamming and a warn for hackusating
3. You have 4 tempbans for team killing
4. Does it matter if you look at team killers? You have to be able report them
5. How does lots of friends help you become moderator except increase the amount of players online?
6. Will you make the server more poplar with #5?
7. o.o wow, looks like I am manager for being diamond.
Show your innerself and express the hapiness of PVP in game by playing <3 not making this when the apps are closed <3
